short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that highlights questions, answers and comments by your favorite users on Stack Exchange sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your favorite users on any Stack Exchange website like Stack Overflow and have all their questions, answers and comments highlighted, so you won't miss anything they have to say ever again.
